contentrichtext.text: {{primarysources|date=September 2010}} {{hatnote|For any of the several German U-boats sometimes referred to as ''U105'', see [[German submarine U-105|German submarine ''U-105'']]}} {{Infobox radio station |name = U105 |image = [[Image:u105logopng.png|200px]] |airdate = 14 November 2005 |frequency = 105.8 MHz<br />[[Freeview (UK)|Freeview]]: 726<br>([[Northern Ireland]] only) |share = 8.60% |share as of = March 2011 |share source = [http://www.rajar.co.uk/listening/quarterly_listening.php] |area = [[Greater Belfast]] |format = [[Soft AC]]/[[Oldies]]/[[Easy listening]] |owner = [[UTV Radio]] |website = [http://www.u105.com/ www.u105.com] }} '''U105''' is a [[Belfast]] based radio station, providing a mix of music and speech as well as hourly news bulletins. It is owned by [[UTV Radio]] and was launched at 6am on Monday 14 November 2005. U105 broadcasts on 105.8 FM in Belfast and surrounding area, from the [[Black Mountain transmitting station]], located a few miles to the west of [[Belfast]]. [[UTV]] broadcasts the radio station throughout [[Northern Ireland]] on its chunk of [[Freeview (UK)|Freeview]]'s Multiplex 2 (which it shares with [[Channel 4]] and [[Teletext]]). It also broadcasts [[Streaming media|livestream]] via the Internet. U105 is also home to some of the most experienced and popular presenters in Northern Ireland, Maurice Jay, (Pleasuredome Musician), Jerry Lang (Biggest Jukebox in The World), Johnny Hero, (Glam Slam singer as well!), Frank Mitchell, (Weatherman extroadinaire), Carolyn Stewart, plus the many excellent presenters who provide a wide range of specialist shows. ==Presenters== * Johnny Hero * [[Frank Mitchell (presenter)|Frank Mitchell]] * [[Carolyn Stewart]] * [[Maurice Jay]] * [[Jerry Lang]] * David Johnson * [[Ivan Martin]] * [[Ken Bruce]] * [[Paul Martin]] * [[Soulfly & Mozkito]] * Paul Boyd * [[Linda Cullen]] * [[Rick Nugent]] * [[John Daly]] ==External links== * [http://www.utvplc.com/indepth.asp?sub=ps&sublk=prl&id=378 UTV Press Release] * [http://www.u105.com U105 Website] * Jerry's Jukebox [http://www.music-finder.co.uk/jjb2.htm] {{UTV Media}} {{Freeview}} {{coord missing|County Antrim}} [[Category:Radio stations in Northern Ireland]] [[Category:Media in Belfast]] [[Category:UTV Radio]] {{UK-radio-station-stub}}
